text:
@realDonaldTrump The American People Blame YOU.. you May NOT want to take responsibility buddy but welcome to the job! The buck stops with YOU.
BTW.. why the hell was @jaredkushner bailed out to the tune of 800 Million when his businesses were failing waaay before #COVID19? Wtf is that about!?
